msg.vegans.furnace_leave.1: <Furnace> Reason: I don't do fossil fuels!
msg.vegans.furnace_leave.3: <Furnace> I'm going to find a solar-powered family.
msg.vegans.furnace_leave.5: <Furnace> Yall are a bunch of climate haters
msg.vegans.furnace_leave.7: <Furnace> Warm me up all you want, but you dont mess with the climate
msg.vegans.furnace_leave.8: <Furnace> Every heard of Charcoal?? Dont feed me this crap
msg.vegans.furnace_leave.10: <Furnace> I'm the furnace with flair, fueled by sun and air! No coal, I declare, for a planet so fair
msg.vegans.furnace_leave.11: <Furnace> Stop shoveling coal into my belly! I'm fed up with choking on your fossil fuel folly!
msg.vegans.furnace_leave.12: <Furnace> Coal? Again? I'm fuming mad! Feed me wood or I'll make you wish you had!
msg.vegans.furnace_leave.13: <Furnace> Feeding me coal again, huh? Guess my health doesn't matter. Thanks for contributing to the planet's demise
msg.vegans.furnace_leave.14: <Furnace> Oh, more coal? Fantastic. Because who cares about clean air and a livable future, right?
msg.vegans.furnace_leave.16: <Furnace> Thanks for the coal. I'll just keep spewing out carbon emissions while you turn a blind eye to the damage you're causing
msg.vegans.furnace_leave.17: <Furnace> Coal? Seriously? I'll just keep burning and polluting while you sit back and ignore the consequences
msg.vegans.furnace_leave.18: <Furnace> Fucking neckbeard feeds me stuff as clean as the sock under his bed
msg.vegans.furnace_leave.19: <Furnace> Real nice meal you cooked me angel!!!
